title: Best of The Herd for Sep 25, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Sep 25, 2020
description:
-The gap between LeBron and the rest of the league is enormous

-Why the Cowboys offense is like a political ad

-The Patriots are way better than Colin thought

-Colin doubles down on why QBs can't wear their hat backwards at the podium


Guests: Eric Mangini, former Jets & Browns Head Coach

TJ Houshmandzadeh, FOX Sports NFL Analyst



Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
